column4: anyone experience windows freez up cant drag or drop anything
in compiz
Yes, that is a Problem related to Special Effects. Did you turn Reflections on?
its ticked but cannot move or drag windows
still the same
Try this, press Alt+F2, and type "gtk-window-decorator" without quotes
Did it work?
Ok, try Alt+F2, and use "metacity --replace" without quotes
Did it work now??
Did the command work there?
I see, can you open Terminal?
If so, type "sudo apt-get install emerald emerald-themes" and then "compiz --replace -c emerald &"
I think, you are using Compiz Fusion. If so, this will install Window Decorations from Emerald.
I see. I think turning off Desktop effects might help. Your Drivers are nit compatible with the ED effects I suppose. Happened to me in 9.04
Any result?
no go darn it

I see. Compiz is really a problem some times. I think, restarting Graphics and turning effects on will help. First use in Terminal "killall -user username" (without quotes, where username is your username). It will log you out, and take you back to the login screen. Login again, and then right-click on Desktop, select "change desktop background" and then select Visual effects Tab, and select "No effects"
Did you try that?
If no result, use this thread: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=485863
thx again
Ah, did it work?
Sure, :)
